    1. Data pre-processing Spatial Downscaling Temporal Downscaling Bias Correction 4. Bias correction

    Function reference

    Data download

    Functions to download data inputs from remote repositories.

    Data (pre)processing and summary functions

    Functions that process and handle model inputs & outputs.

    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    checkinputs()
    Check and summarise coarse resolution climate data inputs
    create_ukcpsst_data()
    Create UKCP sea surface temperature rast stack from ncdf files. Resamples and reprojects sea surface data to aoi as well as interpolating any missing coastal values. Interpolation method = mean of all neighbouring cells.
    era5toclimarray()
    convert era4 ncdf4 file to format required for model
    read_climdata()
    Read climate data
    ukcp18toclimarray()
    convert UKCP18 ncdf4 files to format required for model
    write_climdata()
    Write climate data
    plot_timestats_r()
    Plot timeseries plots of spatial mean, min and max values by various timesteps
    plot_wind()
    Plot star or radar chart of wind cardinal directions

    Spatial downscaling

    Downscaling from coarse to fine spatial resolutions.

    Tpsdownscale()
    Performs thin-plate spline downscaling
    basindelin()
    delineate hydrological or cold-air drainage basins
    coastalexposure()
    Calculates land to sea ratio in upwind direction
    flowacc()
    Calculates accumulated flow
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates via vapour pressure
    precipdownscale()
    Downscale precipitation accounting for elevation effects
    presdownscale()
    Downscale pressure with elevation effects
    relhumdownscale()
    Downscale relative humidity accounting for downscaled temperature
    spatialdownscale()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables
    spatialdownscale_tiles()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables by tiles
    swdownscale()
    Downscale shortwave radiation
    tempdaily_downscale()
    Downscale daily temperatures
    temphrly_downscale()
    Downscale hourly temperature
    winddownscale()
    Downscale wind speed accounting for elevation and terrain sheltering effects
    windelev()
    derive wind terrain adjustment coefficient

    Temporal downscaling

    For example daily to hourly downscaling.

    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    hum_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly relative humidity
    lw_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly downward longwave radiation
    pres_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly atmospheric pressure
    swrad_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly shortwave radiation
    temp_dailytohourly()
    Derives hourly temperature from daily data
    wind_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly wind speed downscake

    Bias correction

    Create and apply models of bias comparing modelled with historical observed data.

    biascorrect()
    Applies bias correction to one climate variable
    biascorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to climate variable
    precipcorrect()
    Applies bias correction to precipitation data
    precipcorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to precipitation data

    Mesoclimate processes

    Modelling of mesoclimate mechanisms.

    clearskyrad()
    Calculates clear sky radiation
    converthumidity()
    Converts between different humidity types
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    difprop()
    Calculates the diffuse fraction from incoming shortwave radiation
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates via vapour pressure

    Data

    Datasets included with package.

    era5input
    A list of ERA5 climate data
    era5sst
    A 0.25 degree grid resolution dataset of sea-surface temperature data
    landsea
    A 100m grid resolution landsea mask
    ukcp18lookup
    A model member lookup table for different UKCP18 collections
    ukcp18sst
    A ~0.1 degree grid resolution dataset of UKCP18 sea-surface temperature data for NW Europe
    ukcpinput
    A list of 12km resolution UKCP18 regional climate data

    Worker functions

    Internal functions called by functions in mesoclim

    Tpsdownscale()
    Performs thin-plate spline downscaling
    atmos_to_sea_pressure()
    Convert atmospheric to sea level pressure
    basindelin()
    delineate hydrological or cold-air drainage basins
    biascorrect()
    Applies bias correction to one climate variable
    biascorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to climate variable
    biascorrect_climdata()
    Apply bias correction models to all climate variables
    blend_tile_lists()
    Blend tile list
    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    calculate_terrain_shading()
    Calculate horizon for different solar azimuths and total skyview
    calculate_windcoeffs()
    Calculate wind coefficients - for use in wind downscaling
    checkinputs()
    Check and summarise coarse resolution climate data inputs
    clearskyrad()
    Calculates clear sky radiation
    coastalexposure()
    Calculates land to sea ratio in upwind direction
    converthumidity()
    Converts between different humidity types
    create_overlapping_tiles()
    Create overlapping tile set
    create_ukcpsst_data()
    Create UKCP sea surface temperature rast stack from ncdf files. Resamples and reprojects sea surface data to aoi as well as interpolating any missing coastal values. Interpolation method = mean of all neighbouring cells.
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    difprop()
    Calculates the diffuse fraction from incoming shortwave radiation
    .blendmosaic()
    blend two adjacent rasters that have overlap called by mosaicblend
    .flowdir()
    Calculate flow direction
    .resample()
    version of terra resample that equates to NA.RM = TRUE
    .sea_to_coast()
    Interpolates sea surface temperature data to coastal regions Resamples sst data to same extent, resolution and projection as aoi Interpolates from mean of adjacent sea cells
    era5input
    A list of ERA5 climate data
    era5sst
    A 0.25 degree grid resolution dataset of sea-surface temperature data
    era5toclimarray()
    convert era4 ncdf4 file to format required for model
    flowacc()
    Calculates accumulated flow
    hum_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly relative humidity
    invls_calc()
    This function returns a numeric matrix identifying matching values from a raster that intersect with a set of points
    landsea
    A 100m grid resolution landsea mask
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates via vapour pressure
    lw_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly downward longwave radiation
    lwdownscale()
    Downscale longwave radiation
    mosaicblend()
    Mosaics a list of overlapping SpatRasters blending overlap areas
    plot_timestats_r()
    Plot timeseries plots of spatial mean, min and max values by various timesteps
    plot_wind()
    Plot star or radar chart of wind cardinal directions
    precipcorrect()
    Applies bias correction to precipitation data
    precipcorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to precipitation data
    precipdownscale()
    Downscale precipitation accounting for elevation effects
    pres_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly atmospheric pressure
    presdownscale()
    Downscale pressure with elevation effects
    read_climdata()
    Read climate data
    relhumdownscale()
    Downscale relative humidity accounting for downscaled temperature
    sea_to_atmos_pressure()
    Convert sea to atmospheric pressure
    spatialdownscale()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables
    spatialdownscale_tiles()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables by tiles
    subdailyrain()
    Estimate sub-daily rainfall from daily rainfall
    swrad_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly shortwave radiation
    swdownscale()
    Downscale shortwave radiation
    temp_dailytohourly()
    Derives hourly temperature from daily data
    tempdaily_downscale()
    Downscale daily temperatures
    temphrly_downscale()
    Downscale hourly temperature
    temporaldownscale()
    Downscale daily climate data to hourly
    ukcp18lookup
    A model member lookup table for different UKCP18 collections
    ukcp18sst
    A ~0.1 degree grid resolution dataset of UKCP18 sea-surface temperature data for NW Europe
    ukcp18toclimarray()
    convert UKCP18 ncdf4 files to format required for model
    ukcpinput
    A list of 12km resolution UKCP18 regional climate data
    wind_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly wind speed downscake
    winddownscale()
    Downscale wind speed accounting for elevation and terrain sheltering effects
    windelev()
    derive wind terrain adjustment coefficient
    write_climdata()
    Write climate data
